actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $10,000 the amount of savings interest which may be excluded from gross income by individuals and to make such exclusion permanent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $10,000 interest income earned on savings accounts. Makes such exclusion permanent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase to $10,000 the amount of savings interest which may be excluded from gross income by individuals and to make such exclusion permanent.
